thread.title: See the moments when Tom Brady, Robert Kraft shook hands with Roger Goodell
thread.title_full: See the moments when Tom Brady, Robert Kraft shook hands with Roger Goodell

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: See the moments when Tom Brady, Robert Kraft shook hands with Roger Goodell
text:
See the moments when Tom Brady, Robert Kraft shook hands with Roger Goodell This moment. Post to Facebook See the moments when Tom Brady, Robert Kraft shook hands with Roger Goodell This moment.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/roger-goodell-tom-brady-robert-kraft/   See the moments when Tom Brady, Robert Kraft shook hands with Roger Goodell Nina Mandell , USA TODAY Sports 11:01 p.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
NFL commissioner Roger Goodell speaks to Tom Brady #12 of the New England Patriots after defeating the Atlanta Falcons during Super Bowl 51 at NRG Stadium on February 5, 2017 in Houston, Texas. (Photo: Getty Images) 
In case you missed it, a scandal we nicknamed 'Deflategate' made the relationship between the NFL commissioner and the Patriots just a bit icy. But, as Brady promised, it was all professionalism when the QB shook hands with the man that suspended him. Goodell, of course, got booed by Patriots fans. remember when roger goodell thought that suspending Tom Brady would ruin our season hahahahahaha pic.twitter.com/06yhWwZ6K4 — Julia Haley (@juliahaley61) February 6, 2017 Goodell getting booed. But Brady's a class act. @WWLP22News pic.twitter.com/KumZvRcbgO — Barry Kriger (@KrigerBarry) February 6, 2017 So this is why Goodell is avoiding Gillette pic.twitter.com/H5tLSqnvaI — Steven Ruiz (@theStevenRuiz) February 6, 2017 
After the game, Brady was asked if the win was a bit of "redemption". 
""This is all positive," he said. "I'm going to go see my family." 
Minutes later, Kraft shook hands with Goodell but then later took pretty blatant shots at the Commissioner shortly after. Roger Goodell booed all over #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/F22DI9vDc2 — Andrew Jerell Jones (@sluggahjells) February 6, 2017 Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/roger-goodell-tom-brady-robert-kraft/ Most Popular
